He has directed the movies Giulia and The Lost Door. ==Life and work== Stuart lived in New York in the late 1970s and early 1980s,"Les filles vues par… Roy Stuart", Lui. Accessed July 29, 2014. working as an actor ("his only role of interest was a bit part in The Godfather Part II, playing an American soldier back from World War II"), musician and in a colour photo lab. He moved to London where he became a photographer and began taking erotic photographs. He later moved to Paris.
